title: Agrawas
author: Agrawas
content: Hi Guys,I am looking for some help to report/track some bitcoin addresses related to Bitcoin Collectibles that were stolen during transit. I saw one of the post link below and was wondering if someone can help giving links to these websites where I can report and track the addresses.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5490289.msg63857401#msg63857401

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I have known these three for a while1. https://scam-alert.io2. https://www.bitcoinabuse.com3 https://www.bitcoinwhoswho.com/scamsThere is also Arkham intelligence - https://intel.arkm.comCheck them out and see which one best suits your needs.

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on March 07, 2025, 10:39:07 PMI have known these three for a while1. https://scam-alert.io2. https://www.bitcoinabuse.com3 https://www.bitcoinwhoswho.com/scamsThere is also Arkham intelligence - https://intel.arkm.comCheck them out and see which one best suits your needs.Thanks!!

comments.author: kloethem
comments.body: Techchainconsult has once helped me withdraw my locked up funds on an investment scam website. There are thousands of them out there, please be careful.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: kloethem on March 09, 2025, 08:19:08 PMTechchainconsult has once helped me withdraw my locked up funds on an investment scam website. There are thousands of them out there, please be careful. Come on! It is 2025. Why are you coming around here with your over 2 decades trick of funds recovery scam?Are you trying to say you are still getting victims to scam ?It's better you get a legitimate job because I am confident, you won't get any victim here. profile tagged.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: For tracking the address you could use blockchain, that's publica inform√°tico, even you could add the address to a wallet on the watch only Mode and that way you will see if someone spend those coins.The fact that you can track the coins doesn't mean that you can recover them.
